Suggested_Setup: A hidden supply drop (food/ammo) left by smugglers or soldiers.
A patch of valuable alchemical plants ready for harvest.
A lost satchel containing money and undelivered mail.
A wrecked vehicle/structure with usable parts or scrap metal.
An armory locker containing a weapon slightly better than current gear.
A natural deposit of precious ore or gems exposed by weather.
A minor magical trinket found in a strange place (e.g., inside a fish).
A painting, statue, or jewelry piece valuable to collectors.
A manual that grants a temporary or permanent bonus to a specific skill.
A piece of a map leading to a larger dungeon or treasure.
A mysterious key that doesn't fit any lock nearby (future plot item).
A rare animal part (pelt, horn) worth gold.
A crate of potions, food, or repair kits.
Fine silk, spices, or wine worth a lot but heavy to carry.
Loose floorboards or a hollow tree containing personal savings.
An item with a family crest; valuable to the right NPC.
A schematic for crafting a new item or upgrade.
A box of foreign coins that need to be exchanged but are high value.
An item that grants a one-time reroll or luck bonus.
An untouched chest containing high-tier loot (roll 3x).
